actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937, to provide that an individual who performed military service during a war service period may have such service credited for annuity purposes under that act even though he entered the military service before such war service period began.

summary.text: Provides, under the Railroad Retirement Act, that an individual who performed military service during a war service period may have such service credited for annuity purposes under that Act, even though he entered the military service before such war service period began.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937, to provide that an individual who performed military service during a war service period may have such service credited for annuity purposes under that act even though he entered the military service before such war service period began.
